ygData.subject: RE: Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)
ygData.msgSnippet: 300 to 400pp?  I wish I knew that Saturday - someone was auctioning a Claw and when I asked him, he said 200pp!  I almost bought it, but I have been saving up
ygData.messageBody:
300 to 400pp? I wish I knew that Saturday - someone was auctioning a Claw
and when I asked him, he said 200pp! I almost bought it, but I have been
saving up for some bronze armor and bought that instead. Almost have the
full suit :)

Angarth Bladedancer, Warrior of the 21st Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"

Cwelenas, Minstrel of the 6th Chord


> ----------
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las
> Vegas)[SMTP:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Saturday, July 10, 1999 12:23 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> The Avatar is level 38 or 39. I think a group of 6 level 30's would have
> a
> very tough time taking him out. He has a ton of hit points, does a Harm
> Touch at the beginning of the battle good for at least 2 bubbles of life,
> and resists chain and root bigtime. i couldn't chain him before level 40,
> and we always had to fight him far from the door and have all our casters
> keep nuking mana cause if he runs and makes it out, you will have a train
> of
> gators and lizzies like you wouldn't believe. I would suggest 6 level
> 35's
> to take him. it's been a while since i fought him, so correct me if i am
> inaccurate.
>
> Oh and the demon claw is very nice. i think closer to 300 to 400pp for it
> though, especially if 500pp is everything you have.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> Erisi, Level 8 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Adam DeMarino [mailto:psycotix@...]
> > Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 9:46 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Demon Claw (Bladed Thulian)
> >
> >
> > From: Adam DeMarino <psycotix@...>
> >
> > I've never seen a demon claw at 500pp; if your getting it fo
> > that much I
> > would say buy it. They are low weight, and very fast. Defintely worth
> > the money unless your heading into lower guk anytime soon and getting
> > some of the great stuff there. At 30 I wouldn't expect you to pay for
> > one anyway. Pick up digs and head into Cazic-thule and start
> > hunting up
> > that rubicite. The same guy with the breastplate has the
> > claw. I'm kinda
> > surprised you haven't hunted it down yet, as on Solusek Ro I
> > rarely see
> > someone above 30 or so not in cazic-thule once they've been
> > there a few
> > days, and I kinda feel bad that I haven't gotten it once,
> > though I have
> > hunted in groups that kiled both golems, and many tae ews, considering
> > I've hunted there for quite some time now.
> >
> > Talonus DuPrey
> > Traveling Bard of Solusek Ro
> >
> > lankyak@... wrote:
> > >
>
> <snip>
